name: Hardcored
description:
Hardcored is a roguelike where you play as a robot in a post apocalyptic, cyberpunk world ruled by robots.

Your objective is to recover your free will, taked by a virus that now controls you and the rest of the robots of the world.

WARNING! The game is currently a propotype version. 

Consider contacting us if you find any error, or just want to tell us about your experience and how you think it could be improved.

WARNING! You MUST use a controller for play the game.

Things we got:

  • Character customization with habilities, pasives and unlockable character parts.
  • A test boss.
  • Diferent types of enemies.
  • A polished combat system.

Things we will add:

  • Random world generation.
  • More types of enemies.
  • More bosses.
  • More levels.
  • A better planned character progression.
  • Narrative.
